direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods process the same parameters (Class<?> and Object) and are part of the same interface, PropertyHandler, with similar control flows and decision-making logic.
Both methods handle date conversion with similar control flows and decision-making logic, although convertDate operates on a Date and a String target type.
Both methods involve date processing, although parseDate converts a String to a Date, while apply converts a Date to a specific SQL date type.
Both methods involve date processing, although formatDate converts a Date to a formatted String, while apply converts a Date to a specific SQL date type.
